body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: A strong aroma of coffee fills the room. It seems to be coming from this guy and his weird contramption. 

 [1]: "Hello" 
 [2]: "Hey, it does smell good here, huh?" 
 [3]: "Hello sir, do you, by any chance, have some spare coffee?" 
 [4]: "What is that weird thing?" 
[5] [Leave the person alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, hello!" 

[1] "Could you give me some coffee?" 
[2] "Nevermind, I'll leave you alone." [Leave]
title: Hey

body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, yeah, I was grinding some coffee. it turned out really good, but I've used my last beans..." 

[1] "Hey, i kinda need some coffee, could you give me some, please?" 
[2] "Wait, you're making coffee with *beans*?" 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: Smell

body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: "Yeah, sure, I've still got some ground coffee, I'll be making it right now! " 

[1]: [Just wait a while (Forbearance | DC 10)]  
[2] [Chat with him (Eloquence | DC 10)]
title: Coffee

body:
[Forbearance]: Waiting is boring. You are young, you should do something, ANYTHING. Not stop and do nothing. At least it's over. (-1 Reason) 

[1]: [Finally grab the coffee and go do something]
title: WaitFail

body:
[Forbearance]: Stopping for a little while is comforting. Seeing the contraptions of the coffee machine working also helps. (+1 Reason) 

[1]: [Catch your coffee and leave]
title: WaitPass

body:
[Eloquence]: Talking is relaxing, no one said anything important. Who cares anyway? (+1 Reason) 

[1]: [Say goodbye and grab the coffee]
title: TalkPass

body:
[Eloquence]: "What where you thinking? You can't talk! You don't even know who you are." (-1 Reason) 

[1]: [Say goodbye and grab the coffee]
title: TalkFail

body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: "I recently got this coffee grinder, now I make the best coffee in NewSun Hotel" 

[1] "Oh, cool, could I try that?" 
[2] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya" [Leave]
title: Thing

body:
[Efrim, the Coffee Grinder]: "Hey again! How was the coffee?" 
[1]: "I am yet to try it, but thanks for it! See you around." 
[2]: "It was great, thank you! Have a nice life!" 
[3]: "It's actually for a friend! But thanks! See you."
title: Start2
